title: In U.K. Police Detention Facilities, One-Person Cells and Simple Beds
summary_full: The police have not said where they were holding Andrew Mountbatten-Windsor, but the facilities are intended to hold people for short periods while they are questioned.
summary_public: The police have not said where they were holding Andrew Mountbatten-Windsor, but the facilities are intended to hold people for short periods while they are questioned.
